text: Wallenfels is a town in Kronach, in Bavaria, Germany. It is in the Frankenwald, 11 km east of Kronach, and 32 km west of Hof. It is a twin town of Bingham, Nottinghamshire, England. ==Geography== Wallenfels is on the B 173, between Hof and Coburg. Bordering communities are Kronach, Marktrodach, Schwarzenbach am Wald, and Presseck. ==References== Category:Kronach (district)
title: Wallenfels
